			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}

					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}

				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}

				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0

				NOT = {

				}
			}

				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes

	option = {
		# 1: EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.1
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 1

			}

		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1

		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 1
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10001
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		# 2: EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM

					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 4
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 7
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.3
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 3
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 3
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 3
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10003
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 7
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.4
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 4
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}

			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4
		}

	option = {
		# 5: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.RUINED_ORGASM

		}
		save_scope_value_as = {

			value = 3
		}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}

			}

		}

			}

				value = 10005
			}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 7
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 6: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
		name = LIDAoption.6

			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 6

			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3

				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 6
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.1
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10006
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 7
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 7: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
		name = LIDAoption.7
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 7

		}

			value = 7

	}

				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.4.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB
			5 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 8
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 9
				}
			}
			# RUINED_ORGASM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 11
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB
			5 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 8
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 8
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 9
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 9
				}
			}
			# RUINED_ORGASM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 11
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 11
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 10
				}
			}

			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 12
				}
			}

			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 13
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 10
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 10
				}
			}

			10 = {

					value = 12
				}

					value = 13
				}
			}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}

				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 8: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.8
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 8
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 8
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 8
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10008
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 10
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 12
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.2
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.9
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {

	option = {
		# 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.RUINED_ORGASM

			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 11
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.4
		}
		else = {

				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10011
			}

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 12
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.2
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM

	# BLOWJOB_SUB: Sub Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {

		}

		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 14
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 17
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 14
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 14
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 17
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 17
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 15
				}
			}
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 16
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 18
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 19
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 15
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 15
				}
			}
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 16
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 16
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 18
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 19
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 19
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.14
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 14
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 14
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 14
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10014
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 16
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 19
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 15: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.15
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 15
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 15
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 15
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.6
	}
	option = {
		# 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.16
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 16
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 16
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 16
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.7
	}
	option = {
		# 17: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
		name = LIDAoption.17
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 17
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 17
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 17
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.1
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10017
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 15
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 16
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 19
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.3
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.18
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 18
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.6
	}
	option = {
		# 19: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
		name = LIDAoption.19
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 19
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 19
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 19
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.3
	}
}
LIDAs.7 = {
	# DEEPTHROAT: Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_kneel_2
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 16
				}
				# Sub Blowjob
				# He takes advantage of your lack of strong resistance to dominate your mouth further. Trapping your head with his hands, he plunges deeper while you gag.\n
				desc = sex_transition_16.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 21
				}
				# Deepthroat
				# He continues fucking your throat while your vision blurs against a mixture of tears, saliva, and sex juices.\n
				desc = sex_transition_21.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10014
				}
				# 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_14.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10017
				}
				# 17: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND failed
				# Try as you might, [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] stops you from pulling away.\n
				desc = sex_transition_17.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10020
				}
				# 20: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# Putting both hands on his waist, you push and try to stop his thrusts. It's all in vain, however, as he ignores you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_20.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 6
			}
			# defaulted to 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_16.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 7
			}
			# defaulted to 21: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT
			desc = sex_transition_21.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.7.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				NOT = { has_trait = lida_sub }
			}
			desc = LIDAs.7.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.7.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2.0
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 20
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 21
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 22
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 21
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 21
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 22
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 20: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.20
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 20
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 20
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 20
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10020
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 21
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.6
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 21: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.21
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 21
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 21
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 21
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.7
	}
	option = {
		# 22: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.22
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 22
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 22
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.6
	}
}
LIDAs.2 = {
	# ASS_TEASE: Ass Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.2.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast

	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.2.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.75
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 23
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 24
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 26
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 23
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 23
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 24
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 24
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 26
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 26
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 25
				}
			}
			# CUM_ON_GROIN
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 27
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 25
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 25
				}
			}
			# CUM_ON_GROIN
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 27
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 27
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 23: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.23
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 23
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 23
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 2
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 23
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10023
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 25
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 27
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 24: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.24
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 24
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 24
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 2
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 24
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10024
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 25
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 27
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 25: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.25
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 25
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 25
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 2
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 25
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	option = {
		# 26: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.26
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 26
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 26
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 2
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 26
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.5
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10026
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 25
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 27
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		# 27: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.27
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 27
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 27

	# ASS_RUB: Ass Rub
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 23
				}
				# Ass Tease
				# You continue to rub his rod in between your buns. You can feel a sticky coolness from [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s tip, slicking up your back. The contrast with the rhythmic thrusts from his hot member makes this an interesting experience.\n
				desc = sex_transition_23.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 28
				}
				# Ass Rub
				# You continue to rub his rod in between your buns. You can feel a sticky coolness from [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s tip, slicking up your back. The contrast with the rhythmic thrusts from his hot member makes this an interesting experience.\n
				desc = sex_transition_28.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 33
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# Having rested a bit by letting him do the thrusting, you restart your own bounce to better control his pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_33.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10023
				}
				# 23: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it.\n
				desc = sex_transition_23.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10024
				}
				# 24: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# He recognizes what you are trying to do and twists his body to avoid having his member fully trapped within your fingers.\n
				desc = sex_transition_24.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10026
				}
				# 26: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You try to guide his stream onto your cheeks, but he is cumming too hard to control\n
				desc = sex_transition_26.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10028
				}
				# 28: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it\n
				desc = sex_transition_28.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10029
				}
				# 29: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# He recognizes what you are trying to do and twists his body to avoid having his member fully trapped within your fingers.\n
				desc = sex_transition_29.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10031
				}
				# 31: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You try to guide his stream onto your cheeks, but he is cumming too hard to control\n
				desc = sex_transition_31.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10033
				}
				# 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# Having tasted a bit of control, he has no intention of relenting and giving it back to you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_33.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10034
				}
				# 34: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# Your thoughts are occupied by his vigorous thrusts, and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like to him thrust inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_34.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10035
				}
				# 35: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL failed
				# You push your groin backwards, trying to force him to the ground, but instead are met with sudden pleasure as you feel [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] grab and enter you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_35.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10036
				}
				# 36: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# His vigorous thrusts invade your mind and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like inside of you. You won't be satisfied with just him inside your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition_36.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10039
				}
				# 39: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You try to guide his stream onto your cheeks, but he is climaxing too hard to control\n
				desc = sex_transition_39.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 23: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_23.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 28: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_28.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_33.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}

	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.75
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 28
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 29
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 31
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 28
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 28
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 29
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 29
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 31
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 31
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 30
				}
			}

			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 32
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 30
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 30
				}
			}
			# CUM_ON_GROIN
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
					}

					value = 32
				}
			}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 28: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.28
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 28
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 28
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 28
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10028
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 30
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 29: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.29
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 29
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 29
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}

				value = 29
			}

		}

			}

				value = 10029

				}

			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 30: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.30
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 30
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 30
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 30
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	option = {
		# 31: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.31
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 31
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 31
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 31
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.5
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10031
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 30
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 32: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.32
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 32
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 32
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.12
	}
}
LIDAs.8 = {
	# HOTDOG: Get Hotdogged
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

		}

		character = root

			}

			}

			}

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10065
				}
				# 65: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_ON_TOP failed
				# Your body tightens as he begins to twitch inside you, but you lose control as he grabs your hips and pulls himself deeper in.\n
				desc = sex_transition_65.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 25: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_25.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 30: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_30.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 34: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_34.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 41: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_41.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 12
			}
			# defaulted to 62: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_62.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.8.desc.0
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.75
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 33
				}
			}
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 34
				}
			}
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 35
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 36
				}
			}
			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 39
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 33
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 33
				}
			}
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 34
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 34
				}
			}
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 35
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 35
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {

					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1

			# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS

					NOT = {

					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 39
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 37
				}
			}
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND

					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}

					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 38
				}
			}

				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 40
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 37
				}
			}
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {

						scope:sub_transition_0 = 38
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {

					value = 38

			}

					}

					value = 40
				}
			}

			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.33
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 33
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 33
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 33
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10033
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 38
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 40
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 34: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.34

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 34
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.8
		}

			}

			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 39
			}

		}

				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10039

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 38
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 40
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.12
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		# 40: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.CUM_ON_GROIN
		name = LIDAoption.40
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 40
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 40

		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 8

			CHANGE = 0
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 40
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.12
	}
}
LIDAs.9 = {
	# STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND: Fingered from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 37

		# 41: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG

				scope:dom_transition_0 = 41

			}

			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 41

			}

LIDAs.5 = {
	# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND: Standing Fucked from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = throne_room_bow_3
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = schadenfreude
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 38
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# One of his thrusts, instead of going up, goes in between your thighs. Your wet folds dribble your anticipation onto his cock. Accepting your body's invitation, his next thrust pierces into you, eliciting a moan from your lips.\n
				desc = sex_transition_38.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 44
				}
				# Fingered from Behind
				# Surrendering to pleasure and wanting more, you involuntarily push your groin backwards, but find #italic something else#! at your entrance. Welcoming the invitation, he plunges into you fully.\n
				desc = sex_transition_44.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 49
				}
				# Standing Fucked from Behind
				# You accept his invasion, each thrust making it harder and harder to pull away and form coherent thoughts. Instead, your mind is filled with a pink haze, urging you to just accept the pleasure of being used like a piece of meat.\n
				desc = sex_transition_49.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 55
				}
				# Ride Facing Away
				# You stand up, letting him take you however he desires\n
				desc = sex_transition_55.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10033
				}
				# 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# Having tasted a bit of control, he has no intention of relenting and giving it back to you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_33.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10034
				}
				# 34: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# Your thoughts are occupied by his vigorous thrusts, and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like to him thrust inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_34.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10035
				}

				desc = sex_transition_35.10000

				# You put your hand on his rod, trying to guide him to cum on your cheeks instead, but are suddenly grabbed.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10058
				}
				# 58: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_ON_TOP failed
				# Your body tightens as he begins to twitch inside you, but you lose control as he grabs your hips and pulls himself deeper in.\n
				desc = sex_transition_58.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 38: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_38.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 44: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_44.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 5
			}
			# defaulted to 49: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_49.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 55: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_55.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.5.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom <= -20
			}
			desc = LIDAs.5.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				scope:subdom >= 10
			}
			desc = LIDAs.5.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 47
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 48
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 51
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 47
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 47
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 48
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 48
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 51
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 51
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 49
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 50
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 52
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 49
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 49
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 50
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 52
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 52
				}
			}
		}
