			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 7
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 7
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 47: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.47
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 47
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 47
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 47
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10047
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 49
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 52
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 48: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.48
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 48
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 48
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 48
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10048
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 49
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 52
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 49: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.49
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 49
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 49
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 49
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 50: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.50
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 50
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 50
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.14
	}
	option = {
		# 51: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.51
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 51
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 51
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 51
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10051
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 49
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 50
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 52
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 52: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.52
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 52
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 52
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 52
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.8
	}
}
LIDAs.11 = {
	# REVERSE_COWGIRL: Ride Facing Away
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.11.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 35
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# You push your groin backwards, forcing him to the ground as you get his rod inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_35.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 53
				}
				# Ride Facing Away
				# You continue riding [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he is powerlessly lying under you, his rod constantly hitting the insides of your walls.\n
				desc = sex_transition_53.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 61
				}
				# Ride Facing Them
				# You turn your back towards [affairs_partner.GetFirstName], treating him as no more than a piece of meat.\n
				desc = sex_transition_61.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10033
				}
				# 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# Having tasted a bit of control, he has no intention of relenting and giving it back to you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_33.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10034
				}
				# 34: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# Your thoughts are occupied by his vigorous thrusts, and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like to him thrust inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_34.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10035
				}
				# 35: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL failed
				# You push your groin backwards, trying to force him to the ground, but instead are met with sudden pleasure as you feel [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] grab and enter you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_35.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10036

				# 36: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# His vigorous thrusts invade your mind and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like inside of you. You won't be satisfied with just him inside your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition_36.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10039
				}
				# 39: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You try to guide his stream onto your cheeks, but he is climaxing too hard to control\n
				desc = sex_transition_39.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10053
				}
				# 53: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL failed
				# You try to continue riding him, but as you slow down a moment he grabs you arms and pushes your waist forward. You nearly topple before feeling a burst of pleasure as [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s cock enters you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_53.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10054
				}

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10057
				}
				# 57: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You put your hand on his rod, trying to guide him to cum on your cheeks instead, but are suddenly grabbed.\n
				desc = sex_transition_57.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10058
				}

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10060

				# You continue riding him, but as you slow down for a moment [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] pushes you backwards, trying to get control over you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_60.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10061
				}
				# 61: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL failed
				# You begin to turn your back towards him, but your legs feel weak and [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] doesn't miss his opportunity to take the lead and guide your next move.\n
				desc = sex_transition_61.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10064

				# Your body tightens as he begins to twitch inside you, but you lose control as he grabs your hips and pulls himself deeper in.\n

			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 35: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_35.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 53: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_53.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 12
			}
			# defaulted to 61: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_61.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.11.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAs.11.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.11.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 3
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 53
				}
			}
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 54
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 57
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 58
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 53
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 53
				}
			}
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 54
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 54
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 57
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 57
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 58
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 58
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 55
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 56
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 59
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 55
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 55
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 56
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 59
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 53: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.53
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 53
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 53
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 53
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.11
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10053
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 55
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 54: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.54
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 54
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 54
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 54
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.12
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10054
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 55
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 55: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.55
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 55
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 55
			}
		}

			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip

			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 55
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 56: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.PRONE_BONE

		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 56

		}

			value = 56
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.14
	}
	option = {
		# 57: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.57
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 57
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 57
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 57
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10057

				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 58: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.58
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 58
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 58
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 58
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.9
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10058
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 55
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 56
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 59: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.59
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 59
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 59
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 11
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 59
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.8
	}
}
LIDAs.12 = {
	# COWGIRL: Ride Facing Them
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.12.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}

				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_71.10000
			}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 11
			}
			# defaulted to 54: EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_54.0
		}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 12
			}
			# defaulted to 60: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_60.0

				scope:sex_transition > 10000

				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 67: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
			desc = sex_transition_67.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam

				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.12.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAs.12.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.12.desc.2
		}
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 60
				}
			}
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 61
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 64
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 65
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 60
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 60
				}
			}
			# REVERSE_COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 61
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 61
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 64
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 64
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 65
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 65
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 62
				}
			}
			# MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 63
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_REGULAR
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 66
				}
			}
		}

			# HOTDOG
			10 = {

					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 62
					}

					value = 62

					}

					}
				}

					value = 66

				NOT = {

				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 60: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.60
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 60
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 60
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 60
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.12
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10060
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 62
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 63
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.13
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 66
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 61: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL

	option = {
		# 65: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_ON_TOP
		name = LIDAoption.65
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 65

			}
		}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 65
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.9
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10065
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 62
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 63
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.13
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 66
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.8
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 66: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_REGULAR
		name = LIDAoption.66
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 66
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 66
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 12
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 66
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.8
	}
}
LIDAs.13 = {
	# MISSIONARY: Lie on Back
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.13.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:root_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
		triggered_outfit = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:partner_naked
			}
			outfit_tags = {
				no_clothes
			}
		}
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 63
				}
				# Ride Facing Them
				# You end up on your back, readying yourself as [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] lifts your legs and enters you from above.\n
				desc = sex_transition_63.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 68
				}
				# Lie on Back
				# You keep your legs up, letting [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] continue nailing you from above.\n
				desc = sex_transition_68.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 73
				}
				# Lie Face Down
				# You find an opening between [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s thrusts and manage to roll in place, your body now facing his.\n
				desc = sex_transition_73.0
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10060
				}
				# 60: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.COWGIRL failed
				# You continue riding him, but as you slow down for a moment [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] pushes you backwards, trying to get control over you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_60.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10061
				}
				# 61: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.REVERSE_COWGIRL failed
				# You begin to turn your back towards him, but your legs feel weak and [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] doesn't miss his opportunity to take the lead and guide your next move.\n
				desc = sex_transition_61.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10064
				}
				# 64: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# You put your hand on his rod, trying to guide him to cum on your cheeks instead, but are suddenly grabbed.\n
				desc = sex_transition_64.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10065
				}
				# 65: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_ON_TOP failed
				# Your body tightens as he begins to twitch inside you, but you lose control as he grabs your hips and pulls himself deeper in.\n
				desc = sex_transition_65.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10067
				}
				# 67: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.COWGIRL failed
				# You grab [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] as he's recovering from a thrust and manage to get on your side, but he grabs and puts you back down.\n
				desc = sex_transition_67.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10070
				}
				# 70: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "Not inside!" you barely blurt out between moans and labored breaths, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_70.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10071
				}
				# 71: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP failed
				# You try to wrap your legs and arms around him, but his wild thrusting makes it impossible to hold on.\n
				desc = sex_transition_71.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10073
				}
				# 73: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY failed
				# You try to roll in place, but [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s paralyzing barrage of thrusts never slows enough to do so.\n
				desc = sex_transition_73.10000
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10075
				}
				# 75: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS failed
				# "D-Don't fill me!" you shakingly say as his pounding nearly drives you senseless, but your pleas falls on deaf ears.\n
				desc = sex_transition_75.10000
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 12
			}
			# defaulted to 63: EventsSex.COWGIRL -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY
			desc = sex_transition_63.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 13
			}
			# defaulted to 68: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY
			desc = sex_transition_68.0
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 73: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY
			desc = sex_transition_73.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.13.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.13.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAs.13.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAs.13.desc.3
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 67
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 70
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_KEEP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 71
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# COWGIRL
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 67
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 67
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 70
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 70
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_KEEP
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 71
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 71
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 68
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 69
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_BRED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 72
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 68
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 68
				}
			}
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 69
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 69
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_BRED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 72
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 67: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.COWGIRL
		name = LIDAoption.67
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 67
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 67
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 67
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.12
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10067
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 68
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.13
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 69
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}

		# 68: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY

		}

			name = sex_transition
			value = 69
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.14
	}
	option = {
		# 70: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.70
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 70
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 70
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 70
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10070
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 68
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.13
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 69
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 71: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_KEEP
		name = LIDAoption.71
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 71
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 71
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}

				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 71
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.11
		}
		else = {

				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10071
			}

				}

			}

				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 72: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
		name = LIDAoption.72
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 72
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 72
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 13
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 72
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.10
	}
}

	# PRONE_BONE: Lie Face Down
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.14.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {

			scope:locale = flag:battlefield

		event_background = battlefield

				scope:sex_transition > 10000

				scope:prev_event = 13

			# defaulted to 69: EventsSex.MISSIONARY -> EventsSex.PRONE_BONE

				scope:sex_transition > 10000

				scope:prev_event = 14
			}
			# defaulted to 74: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.PRONE_BONE
			desc = sex_transition_74.0
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = pm_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = pm_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = pm_med_stam
			}
			desc = pm_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.14.desc.0
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_sub
			}
			desc = LIDAs.14.desc.1
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				has_trait = lida_dom
			}
			desc = LIDAs.14.desc.2
		}
		desc = LIDAs.14.desc.3
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 3.5
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 2.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 73
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 75
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# MISSIONARY
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 73
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 73
				}
			}
			# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 75
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 75
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:dom_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = dom_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 74
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_BRED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 76
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# PRONE_BONE
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina > 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 74
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 74
				}
			}
			# CREAMPIE_BRED
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina <= 0
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 76
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					exists = scope:sub_transition_1
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sub_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 15
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 15
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = root_naked
			value = yes
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = partner_naked
			value = yes
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 73: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.MISSIONARY
		name = LIDAoption.73
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 73
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 73
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 73
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.13
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10073
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 74
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 74: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsSex.PRONE_BONE
		name = LIDAoption.74
		trigger = {
			scope:partner_stamina > 0
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 74
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 74
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 74
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.14
	}
	option = {
		# 75: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.75
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 75
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 75
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 75
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAc.7
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10075
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 74
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.14
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAc.10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:root_cum = yes
			}
			custom_tooltip = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
			add_internal_flag = dangerous
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 76: EventsSex.PRONE_BONE -> EventsCum.CREAMPIE_BRED
		name = LIDAoption.76
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 76
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 76
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 14
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 76
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.10
	}
}
